Articles.Content:
We all know the next SQUAD update will bring upgradeable constructions at the KSC.

So i wonder, is an "Story Mode" the next logical step in the game development?

What you guys think? We already got a Sandbox, science and economy game mode...
Considering 0.26/0.90 will be "scope complete" with all major game modes implemented I think that's not very likely, but we'll have to wait and see

Can you imagine Squad's story:

"One day, Jeb built a command-pod in his garden. He sat in it until he was bored than got out and took some dirt into the house, where he told all his friends about it. +SCIENCE , +REPUTATION.

Bob asked Jeb if the command-pod could fly so the next day Jeb got into the command pod while his friends lifted it up andput a fuel tank and rocket engine under it (no-one had invented a ladder yet) then he blasted into orbit. +FUNDS, +SCIENCE, +REPUTATION.

...

Years later someone invented the wheel."
